I’m always using Mason jars in my kitchen. Whether I’m storing bulk granola to keep it fresh, or portioning out the curry I just made for the week, there’s always a need for reliable storage solutions in my home. But my glass containers always seem to go missing, so I’m always on the hunt for new ones to fill my cupboard. 

Recently, Dollar Tree stocked its shelves with the most beautiful Mason jars, and when I stumbled upon this find, I knew I had to head over to my nearest store to grab a few.

What makes these Mason jars stand out is their unique cube-like shape. They’re 3.5×3.5×4.125 inches in size. They’re designed with an iridescent glass base, so in a certain light they’ll sparkle. They also have a stunning rose gold resealable lid.

People are using these rose gold square jars on social media in all kinds of crafty projects. One creator bought a couple of them and turned them into a candy apothecary by filling the containers with all kinds of sweets.

One person commented on the post detailing this Mason jar DIY hack, saying, “I have a shelf full of them. They always come in handy.” Another user commented, “I’m going to Dollar Tree!!!!”

These stylish rose gold Mason jars make excellent homemade gifts for the holidays; you can fill them with festive trinkets or decadent chocolates. Their beautiful design also makes them ideal for home decor, parties, or even weddings. Plus, with their airtight seal, they’re great for storing food, which makes them a truly versatile find.
